item.description:
An approx. 3 mile hike through the center of the park (north) and then taking the pink blaze trail (north, then south) and then the yellow blaze trail for a nice rather level hike along Rainbow Reservoir and back to the start. I'll meet folks at 1:30 PM in the parking lot.

From their website: "the park is a 473-acre multi-recreational facility operated by the Town of Windsor, Connecticut, offering an interpretive nature center, 12 miles of trails, maple sugaring, a Coffee House Concert Series, gift shop, and more."

The leader will be Gloria (http://hiking.meetup.... ). Any questions should be directed to her... cell is 860-371-7125

Location (and turn-by-turn directions available) at
http://www.mapquest.c...

General directions can be found at
http://www.northwestp...

Hiking map
http://www.northwestp...

Northwest Park information
http://www.northwestp...

item.name: Hike at Northwest Park in Windsor CT
